DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Hey! Welcome to my "Point And Click Engine" ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Let me guide you through this ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Can you walk to the right with the arrow keys? Or [A] [D]

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: This looks different, but still the same. What if we even go a bit further to the right?

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: I guess we have seen all worlds now ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Anyway, I was wondering if you can help me? ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: I need to find 15 people. I've heard they got something for me ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: See all the people in the background? They should be somewhere in there ...

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: No, look further.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: It's not the one I'm looking for.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: That's not the correct person.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Wrong person.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: You found

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: The first person is someone named "Aladdin".

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Next one. Have you heard of someone named "Hulk"?

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Let's continue. I heard she likes apples.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Next! I hope you've seen Starwars?

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Let's look further. The person I'm looking for got married today.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Ok! You might not believe it, but this persons is the captain of a whole continent.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Can you find the next one for me? Forgot his name...It's this creature you can't overlook.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: By the way, have you seen Guardians of the Galaxy?

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: Now I'm looking for Mr. Jones.

DialogueLine.speaker: Player
DialogueLine.line: So.. I've heard that this person died in the pool. Get it?
